attributes.action: More funding to be put towards schools,as well as the special needs departments.
attributes.additional_details: It doesn't matter when ethnic background you are,race,religion or where you are from,you still have the right to have a proper education,and to enhance the education performance throughout school,I do believe more money needs to be invested...
attributes.background: More money should be invested to schools to help with supporting & giving children with special needs the same rights that everyone has a right to: a education.This is very personal to me,as someone i know was subjected to 3 years out of school,due to a lack of support within schools.
